question: Profile levelling is usually done for determining:
For locating a distant object visible from two transit stations, the method usually preferred to, is:

answers.b: Angles and distances from transit stations
answers.d: Angle from one transit station and distance from the other

question: A building is an obstacle to:
Determining the difference in elevation between two points on the surface of the earth, is known as:

answers.a: Is maximum if the staff is held truly normal to the line of sight
answers.b: Decreases if the staff is tilted away from normal
answers.c: Is minimum if the staff is held truly normal to the line of sight
answers.d: Increases if the staff is tilted away from normal
